ImmunoSpot

Introduction

Manufactured under an ISO 9001:2008 certified Quality Management System, CTL analyzers offer image analysis using both visible and fluorescent light. Equipped with the “Gold Standard” ImmunoSpot® Software, these instruments have set the precedence for ELISPOT analysis worldwide. With the optional BioSpot® Software loaded, they are able to analyze many assays that previously had to be counted by eye, such as high-throughput single-cell analysis/counting, colony, and plaque assays.
http://www.immunospot.com/index.php?id=127
